alert.note: Alert for Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:20PM EDT until June 14 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR NASSAU AND SOUTHEASTERN CHARLTON COUNTIES... At 920 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Callahan, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Callahan, Kings Ferry, Nassau Village-Ratliff, St. George, Ratliff and Bryceville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
